page.title: 16Interview with the vicar.
page.content: When the vicar was little he used to be in the choir at Canterbury Cathedral. His mother and father took him to church every Sunday. When he was older he became a school teacher for sixteen years,then he decided to be a vicar. At first his family were worried about that. He has four children. In his spare time he likes reading and listening to music, and watching cricket and football. He tries to get every Monday off. He likes being a vicar.The vicar has four churches in his parish. Baston, Langtoft, where he lives, Braceborough and Wilsthorpe.He holds a service daily in Langtoft,a Sunday service in Langtoft and Baston and alternate Sunday mornings at Braceborough and Wilsthorpe.He also takes christenings, weddings and funerals and visits sick people in his parish.
